description: This course is designed to provide students with trainings in critical thinking and science communication, and to expose students to a variety of important research topics in biology science.
goals: Expose students to various research topics in biology science.
Provide students trainings in communicating science critically and effectively
Provide students trainings in science research ethics and strategies
